alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Inland San Patricio; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:03AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern San Patricio, western Goliad, Live Oak and Bee Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 503 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Karnes City to 6 miles southeast of Karon to near Lagarto. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Mathis, George West, Three Rivers, Skidmore, Lake City, River Creek Acres, Tynan, Argenta, Annarose, Karon, Mount Lucas, Normanna, Pawnee, Ray Point, Dinero, Charco, Mineral, Berclair and Lagarto. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 33 and 83. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 648. US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 614. US Highway 59 between mile markers 670 and 738. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Inland San Patricio; Live Oak
